column4: A 8.04 upgraded to 8.10. And now the network manager can't connect to any network at all
any ideas what to do?
open a terminal and type ifconfig how many listings are there
are you trying to connect to wired or wireless
lo eth0 wlan0 wmaster0
both wireless and wired
sudo dhclient eth0 for wired
that works
do you have an open wifi hotspot (not encrypted)
yup
if so then sudo dhclient wlan0
tried that as well... even tried to force it to use the correct ap and ssid though iwconfig
you need to associate the card with the AP
iwconfig wlan0 ap any works
check that the essid is not hidden; I tend to use the command line as it is more reliable
though is this with hardy or ibex
I have a wife that needs to use it as well... so the GUI have to work since she is used to windows
if this is ibex it may be a bug
8.10... can't remember the name :)
yup that is intrepid ibex
thought so... Okay...
aha nice going
well... dpkg --list does show usefull things :)
but thanks for you input :)
